v8:item.v8:content: You can get the data in the personal account of the service (Service manager). On the home page, go to Collaboration system management > Get code for local infobase.
The application will be linked to this address. Further, confirmation codes will come to this address.
This is a collaboration system user
Collaboration System integration in SaaS is enabled
Connection to collaboration system in SaaS mode is available
Name of object to be processed
Collaboration system registration on server is supported
Users mapping table will be populated
Using this data, you can map infobase users to service users. You can get the data in the personal account of the service (Service manager).
